short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: URL Params Editor Pro Max Plus is the browser extension to view/edit/copy decoded URL parameters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The single purpose browser extension to view/edit/copy decoded URL parameters.

1. Install extension.
2. Pin extension in the toolbar for easy access.
3. Visit any site with search query parameters.
4. Click the extension icon in the toolbar to view the decoded URL parameters.
5. Edit: Add/Update/Remove.
6. Copy: individual param value | all params as JSON | encoded/decoded URL.
7. Open: the updated URL in the current tab | in a new tab.
8. No information is collected or transferred.

If it is useful and you like it, please rate.
